snippet: Gov. Scott Walker, a Republican who has sought to limit collective bargaining, faces a tough race that has implications for unions and the results of the presidential election.
abstract: Gov Scott Walker of Wisconsin and his opponent, Mayor Tom Barrett of Milwaukee, dash through their final day of campaigning before the state's closely-watched recall election; Walker, a Republican who has sought to limit collective bargaining, faces a tough race that has implications for the future of unions and could affect the results of the presidential election.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Scott Walker, a Republican who has sought to limit collective bargaining, faces a tough race that has implications for unions and the results of the presidential election.

headline.seo: Wisconsin Governor Recall Election Is Today
headline.main: Frenzied Campaigning on Eve of Wisconsin Vote
headline.print_headline: Frenzied Campaigning On Eve of Wisconsin Vote
